entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is experiencing a surge of Voldemort's anger and feeling his scar tingling.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: A dark wizard who is the antagonist of the story, whose anger is felt by Harry through his scar.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend and companion, who tries to reassure him after the incident.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's other friend and companion, who is concerned about Harry's well-being after the incident.

entities.name: ollivander
entities.description: A wand maker mentioned in passing by Harry.

relationships.description: Harry has a connection to Voldemort through his scar, which allows him to feel the dark wizard's anger.
Harry is friends with Ron and seeks his reassurance after the incident.
Harry is also friends with Hermione, who is concerned about his well-being after the incident.
Voldemort's anger is connected to Harry through his scar.
